title: From Fine-Tuning to Production: A Scalable Embedding Pipeline with Dataflow
summary: Learn how to use Google's EmbeddingGemma, an efficient open model, with Google Cloud's Dataflow and vector databases like AlloyDB to build scalable, real-time knowledge ingestion pipelines.
content: Learn how to use Google's EmbeddingGemma, an efficient open model, with Google Cloud's Dataflow and vector databases like AlloyDB to build scalable, real-time knowledge ingestion pipelines.
